friendly_name.description: A user-friendly nickname for the phone number

lata.description: Local access and transport area code for the phone number

rate_center.description: Rate center for the phone number

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the phone number's location

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the phone number's location

locality.description: Locality or city associated with the phone number

region.description: Region or state associated with the phone number

postal_code.description: Postal code of the phone number's location

iso_country.description: ISO country code of the phone number

address_requirements.description: The requirements related to the address associated with the phone number

beta.description: Indicator showing if the phone number is in beta testing

capabilities.description: Object containing the capabilities of the available phone number
